doc.field:

In Reference To: Business / Professional; C.F. Zeller Engraving Print Poster from Munich, [Germany] from Sophie Ott, 1880
51 Pages, Unbound
Printed & Handwritten in Ink & Pencil
Measurements: 2.25" x 1.25" - 16.5" x 18
